name: Kill'em All
description:
This is my first game...I don't expect a lot from it but i hope that you will enjoy playing it.

The game principle is simple. Just kill all the respawning enemies and try to survive as long as you can.

The difficulty of the game changes every 5 kills. This means that they will be faster in movement, they will shoot faster, and they will aim at you, well...faster.

Also, feel free to share your game stats in the comments section.Let's see who has the best stats.

If you like,you can watch the gameplay video I uploaded on my channel.

Enjoy!
